name: Liquid Sunshine Sun Got a Shimmer - Roller Ball
description: Soothing lavender roller ball perfect for on-the-go relaxation. Shimmer formula adds a subtle glow.

name: Lavender Sachet
description: Filled with dried lavender from our fields. Perfect for drawers, closets, or under your pillow for restful sleep.

name: Lavender Candle
description: Hand-poured candle infused with pure lavender essential oil. Creates a calming ambiance in any room.

name: Lavender Tea Towel
description: 100% cotton tea towel featuring Olympic Bluffs lavender design. Functional and decorative.

name: Lavender Herb Blend
description: Culinary lavender blend perfect for baking, cooking, and beverages. Grown and dried on our farm.

name: Olympic Bluffs Honey
description: Raw, unfiltered honey from our apiary. Our bees pollinate the lavender fields and orchard.

name: Cashew Delight
description: Luxurious cashew and lavender body butter. Deeply moisturizing and naturally scented.

name: Dry Skin Repair
description: Intensive repair balm for dry, cracked skin. Made with lavender oil and nourishing botanicals.

name: Lavender Farm Magnets
description: Collectible magnets featuring Olympic Bluffs lavender farm imagery.

name: Lavender Sticker Set
description: Set of weather-resistant stickers with lavender and farm designs.

name: Pure Lavender Essential Oil
description: 100% pure lavender essential oil distilled from our farm-grown lavender. 10ml bottle.
